name: P-Space
description:
Take command of spaceships with up to 8 players and complete a series of campaign scenarios, challenges, and randomly generated content. First time players are recommended to read instructions first.

Game Controls:

  • Up/Down/Left/Right/X to use controls
  • C or V and Left or Right to move stations

Generic Pico-8 Controls:

  • Player 1 defaults: Cursors + ZX  or  NM or CV
  • Player 2 defaults: SDFE + WA
  • Pause Menu: Enter or P  while running
  • Restart cart: Ctrl+R
  • Mute/Unmute: Ctrl+M
  • Toggle Fullscreen: Alt+Enter 

Pause Menu Controls:

  • Arrow keys to select option
  • X or V to select option
  • Z or C to go back to previous menu
  • Ctrl+M to turn off sounds

Mobile Controls:

  • Very similar except in the virtual handset the O button represents the Z key

Controllers:

  • You can use any game controllers recognized by SDL with PICO-8

Browser Edition:

The free-to-play browser version contains eight campaign scenarios and daily random scenario.

Demo Edition:

A downloadable version of the free-to-play browser edition available for Windows, Linux, Mac, and Raspberry Pi.

Premium Edition:

Purchasing the game will grant access to the premium standalone downloads for Linux, Mac, Windows and Raspberry Pi. This version unlocks the unlimited random scenario mode and eight challenge scenarios. Source code is not included.
